snippet.title: Tails of Iron - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: Tails of Iron is an Adventure RPG-lite game set in a charming and brutal world. Playing as Redgi the Rat, you are heir to the throne when your kingdom is raided by the Iron Frog. Players face challenging, tactical and stunning combat encounters in order to rebuild the Rat Kingdom.

localized.title: Tails of Iron - Announcement Trailer
